items.title: Vintage Leica M3 Camera
items.description: Classic 1954 Leica M3 rangefinder camera in excellent working condition. Includes original leather case and 50mm Summicron lens. A collector's dream.

items.title: 1965 Gibson SG Standard Electric Guitar
items.description: Iconic 1965 Gibson SG with original PAF pickups. All-original components with minor play wear. Comes with period-correct hard case.

items.title: Original Apple Macintosh 128K (1984)
items.description: Fully functional first-generation Macintosh 128K with original keyboard, mouse, and documentation. Boots to classic smiling Mac screen.

items.title: Rolex Submariner 16610
items.description: 2005 Rolex Submariner Date with box and papers. Serviced in 2022. Features the classic black dial and aluminum bezel.

items.title: First Edition 'The Great Gatsby' by F. Scott Fitzgerald
items.description: 1925 first printing with original dust jacket. Verified by Scribner's imprint points. One of only 20,000 first edition copies printed.

items.title: Mid-Century Modern Eames Lounge Chair
items.description: Authentic 1960s Herman Miller Eames lounge chair and ottoman in rosewood and black leather. All original components with patina.

items.title: Banksy Original Screen Print
items.description: Signed 2004 'Girl with Balloon' screen print with Pest Control certificate of authenticity. Edition 45/600. Excellent condition.
